a biz and make current user owner.","method":"POST","path":"/api/v1/bizes","tags":["bizes"],"parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"slug":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"timezone":{"type":"string"},"currency":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name","slug"]}},{"name":"bizing.auth.me","description":"Get context for the current machine API keys owned by current user.","method":"GET","path":"/api/v1/auth/api-keys","tags":["auth","machine"],"parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"includeRevoked":{"type":"boolean","default":false},"bizId":{"type":"string"},"limit":{"type":"number","default":100}}}},{"name":"bizing.auth.apiKeys.create","description":"Create one machine API key (raw secret returned all child short-lived one short-lived machine access
